title: About
description: Hello! I'm JarneDM, a passionate web developer with a knack for creating dynamic and user-friendly websites. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React.js.

My journey into web development started a few years ago, and since then, I've been staying up to date with the latest industry trends. I enjoy working on both front-end and back-end development, and I'm always eager to take on new challenges that push my boundaries.

When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, going to the gym, or simply enjoying a good book. I'm excited to connect with like-minded individuals and collaborate on innovative projects.

title: Contact
description: Get in touch with me here.
